This was Cliff Bolton's major-league debut

$Lou Gehrig out for passing Lyn Lary, who thought the ball was caught and went to the dugout after reaching 3B; this was a home run and Gehrig ended the season tied with Babe Ruth for the home run lead
$Dusty Cooke injured his shoulder diving for ball when his spikes caught
Bottom of 7th to end reconstructed from NYT and Post stories

$Carl Fischer threw to 1B late; the Yankees had 2 runners on 3B; Joe Judge ran to 3B and tagged both runners; 3B umpire Tommy Connolly called out Ben Chapman; Connolly reversed himself after Chapman was in the dugout; Connolly recalled Chapman and ruled Sammy Byrd out
$Roy Spencer and Joe Judge collided
